name: Spinnaker
description: True 'brand humanisation'​ is about being in step with communities and other humans. We believe that brands should strive for the same. Brands need to listen more; they need to develop a pack mentality; they must influence through participation not ‘kingship’; they must be conversational in tone and behaviour; they must be contextual and involved; and brands must be useful.

locations.address: Nutmeg House, 60 Gainsford Street Tower Bridge
